sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Salaries Act.

sections.heading: There shall be allowed and paid an annual
sections.text:
salary in lieu of all other salaries, fees, perquisites, benefit of
compensation in any form whatsoever, to each of the officers herein named, the
following respectively:

sections.heading: Salaries of Judges of the Supreme Court.
sections.text:
From July 1, 1982 through
June 30, 1983,
the annual salary of each judge of the Supreme Court shall be $66,500,
to be paid out of the State Treasury. On and after July 1,
1983, the annual salary of each judge of the Supreme Court shall be
$75,000, or as set by the Compensation Review Board, whichever is greater,
to be paid out of the State Treasury.

sections.heading: Salaries of Judges of the Appellate Court.
sections.text:
From July 1, 1982
through June 30, 1983,
the annual salary of each judge of the Appellate Court shall be $61,500,
to be paid out of the State Treasury. On and after July 1, 1983,
the annual salary of each judge of the Appellate Court shall be
$70,000, or as set by the Compensation Review Board, whichever is greater,
to be paid out of the State Treasury.

sections.heading: Salaries of
sections.text:
Judges of the Circuit Court. From July 1, 1982 through June 30, 1983,
each judge of the Circuit Court shall receive and be paid out of the
State Treasury an annual salary of $57,500. On and after July 1, 1983,
each judge of the Circuit Court shall receive and be paid out of the State
Treasury an annual salary of $65,000, or an amount set by the Compensation
Review Board, whichever is greater. The judges of the Circuit Court
in the Judicial Court constituted by the First Judicial District and in
other Judicial circuits composed of a single county shall each be paid by
the county in which their circuit lies an additional salary of $500 per
year. Such additional salary shall be paid in installments by the County
Clerk, at the end of each half month, by drawing a warrant therefor in
favor of each of the judges on the County Treasurer who shall pay the same
on presentation properly endorsed.

sections.heading: Salaries of Associate Judges of the Circuit Court.
sections.text: Salaries of Associate Judges of the Circuit Court.

sections.heading: The salaries of the officers herein above named, provided to be paid out
sections.text:
of State treasury, shall be paid to the officers above named at least
monthly, on the warrant of the State Comptroller, out of any money in the
State treasury not otherwise appropriated.
